IX.iii.1.G.1.a
.
Two Types of Deductible Expenses
There are two types of deductible expenses, those that are allowed
as deductions from total countable income, and
only as deductions from specific income.
Reference
:  For more information on deductions from specific income, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.K.6
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section G - Pension - Deductible Medical Expenses
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section G
